text:
tiShTha#tIvaq hya#sAvathO# aqmUmEqva tEnaq yaja#mAnO duhEq yadAsI#naqH Sa(gm)sa#tiq tasmA#diqtaH pra#dAnaM dEqvA upa# jIvantiq yat tiShTha#n pratigRuqNAtiq tasmA#daqmuta#H pradAnaM manuqShyA# upa# jIvantiq yat prA~gAsI#naqH Sa(gm)sa#ti praqtya~g tiShTha#n pratigRuqNAtiq tasmA$t prAqcInaq(gm)q rEtO# dhIyatE praqtIcI$H praqjA jA#yantEq yadvai hOtA$&ddhvaqryuma#ByAqhvaya#tEq vajra#mEnamaqBi prava#rtayatiq ( ) parAq~gA va#rtatEq vajra#mEqva tanni ka#rOti || 41
(sava#nEq vajra#maqntardha#ttEq - trINyEqtAnyaqkSharA#NI - ndriqyaM mAdhya#ndinaq(gm)q sava#naqM - nO - dgA#tRuqNA - ma#dhvaqryurnaiti# - vartayatyaq - ShTau ca#) (A9)
